com.burstly.lib.component.networkcomponent
Interface IActivityLifeCycleAware

All Known Subinterfaces:
BurstlyFullscreenActivity.IFullscreenView, IDestroyableActivityLifecycleAware
All Known Implementing Classes:
AdaptorCustomFullscreen, FullscreenOverlayContainer, LoadingAwareWebView, MraidFullscreenOverlay, MraidView, OrmmaView, OverlayContainer, RewardsFullscreenOverlay, RewardsView, ScriptInterstitialOverlay, UiSafeWebView, VideoFullscreen
public interface IActivityLifeCycleAware

Component that is aware of Activity lifecycle callbacks.

Author:
Alexey Redinskii
